title: can someone gift me champions
body: i really want ezreal, pantheon and jarvan but i can't save up, so i wanted someone to gift me these champions, thats all i am asking for, i will play games with you and help y out, all i am asking is three champions plzz. add me on lol for gifting, TwistedPower. thanks in advance.

replies.body: i changed my mind i am fine with ezreal and rammus. plzz gift me.
